DOC.brief_title: E2 LDX Treatment Cognitive Complaints After Oophorectomy
DOC.criteria: Women age 30 48 eligible study : 1 . Have previous present history DSMIV psychiatric disorder within previous year substance dependence disorder within previous 5 year ( psychostimulant abuse lifetime history ) , accord Structured Clinical Interview Diagnosis DSMIV ( SCID ) NonPatient Version ; 2 . Planning undergo oophorectomy full hysterectomy ; 3 . Are premenopaual ( baseline follicle stimulate hormone level ( FSH ) < 20 IU/ml ) ; 4 . Smoke < 10 cigarette per day 5 . Are righthanded ; 6 . Can provide proof gynecological exam PAP test do within previous 3 year time screening ; 7 . Can provide proof mammogram within previous 12 month time screen ; 8 . Are able give write informed consent ; 9 . Must clear urine toxicology screen upon recruitment ; 10 . Are fluent write spoken English ; 11 . Negative urine pregnancy test . 1 . Minimental status exam score less equal 24 ; 2 . Presence psychiatric disorder within previous year life time history ADHD psychotic disorder include bipolar disorder , schizoaffective disorder schizophrenia ; 3 . Lifetime history drug addiction abuse , except nicotine ; 4 . Regular use psychotropic medication ; 5 . Regular use ( week ) alcohol great 3 drink per day ; 6 . Presence contraindication treatment stimulant medication ; would include presence hypertension ( control uncontrolled ) , coronary disease , atrial fibrillation , arrhythmia ; 7 . History seizure ; 8 . Presence contraindication treatment estrogen ; would include presence history blood clot , estrogenreceptor positive breast cancer ; 9 . Claustrophobia ; 10 . History cardiac disease include know cardiac defect conduction abnormality ; 11 . Abnormal electrocardiogram screening ; 12 . Current pregnancy planning become pregnant ; 13 . Presence metallic implant
